categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Malee Hurra was a female human Rebel Alliance pilot who flew a Scurrg H-6 Bomber during the Galactic Civil War.
Malee Hurra appears as a squadron card for the Scurrg H-6 Bomber in the 2019 expansion Rebellion in the Rim campaign expansion for Star Wars: Armada.
